survey_brief: This survey aims to understand the commuting habits, preferences, and challenges of urban bicycle commuters to improve infrastructure and services.

questions.question_text: How often do you commute by bicycle?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure options cover all frequency ranges.

script.question_text: How often do you commute by bicycle?

questions.question_text: What are your primary reasons for commuting by bicycle? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-select. Include an 'Other' option with an open-text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes) with optional open-text for 'Other'

script.question_text: What are your primary reasons for commuting by bicycle? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What is the approximate distance of your typical bicycle commute (one way)?
questions.routing_logic: Show if Q1 answer is not 'Less than once per week' or 'Only seasonally'
questions.client_notes: Display logic ensures relevance. Use a single-choice scale for distance ranges.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE (radio buttons) with conditional display

script.question_text: What is the approximate distance of your typical bicycle commute (one way)?
script.routing_logic: Show if Q1 answer is not 'Less than once per week' or 'Only seasonally'

questions.question_text: Describe the biggest challenge you face when commuting by bicycle.
questions.client_notes: Open-text field to capture qualitative insights. Limit to 250 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: OPEN_TEXT with character limit

script.question_text: Describe the biggest challenge you face when commuting by bicycle.

questions.question_text: Which of the following would most encourage you to bicycle more often?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice with an 'Other' option. Randomize options to avoid bias.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE (radio buttons) with option randomization
